summary: A weapon that can be found in Beezehome in whiterun
descriptionHtml: It is based of the glass sword, it cannot be crafted at a forge but you don\'t need to complete any quests to attain it either. It has a very long lasting powerful fire enchantment on it and if you have upgraded your onehanded to full it will deal 75 base and 30 fire damage to make 105 total damage, that is enough to 1-2 hit kill most opponents but is not to overpowered when it comes to harder enemies.
author: marcusroberts1
